info.title: Student AI Bot
info.description: API for Student AI Bot service

post.description:
Authenticate a user and issue an access token.

Args:
    response: FastAPI response object for setting cookies
    request: Login request

Returns:
    Access token

Authenticate a user using OAuth2 password flow.
This endpoint is compatible with OpenAPI's OAuth2 password flow.

Args:
    response: FastAPI response object for setting cookies
    form_data: OAuth2 form data

Returns:
    Access token

Log out a user by invalidating their session.

Args:
    response: FastAPI response object for clearing cookies
    current_user: Current authenticated user

Returns:
    Success message

Refresh an access token.

Args:
    response: FastAPI response object for setting cookies
    current_user: Current authenticated user

Returns:
    New access token

get.description:
Get the current user's profile.

Args:
    current_user: Current authenticated user

Returns:
    User profile data

post.description:
Upload and process a file (PDF, text, DOCX, or image).

Args:
    background_tasks: FastAPI background tasks
    file: The file to upload
    current_user: The authenticated user
    client_id: Optional client ID for WebSocket notifications

Returns:
    Processing status and document ID

get.description:
Get the status of a processing task.

Args:
    task_id: The ID of the task
    current_user: The authenticated user

Returns:
    Current processing status

post.description:
Process a YouTube video link.

Args:
    background_tasks: FastAPI background tasks
    request: The YouTube upload request
    current_user: The authenticated user
    client_id: Optional client ID for WebSocket notifications

Returns:
    Processing status and document ID

get.description:
Get a list of documents uploaded by the current user.

Args:
    current_user: The authenticated user

Returns:
    List of user documents

schema.title: Response Get User Documents Api Uploads Documents Get

delete.description:
Terminate a running task.

Args:
    task_id: The ID of the task to terminate
    current_user: The authenticated user

Returns:
    Status of the termination request

schema.title: Response Terminate Task Api Uploads Task  Task Id  Delete

get.description:
List active sessions for the current user.

Args:
    current_user: The authenticated user
    limit: Maximum number of sessions to return

Returns:
    List of active sessions with metadata

delete.description:
Delete all sessions for the current user.

Args:
    current_user: The authenticated user

Returns:
    Success message with count of deleted sessions

get.description:
Get details about a specific session.

Args:
    session_id: The ID of the session
    current_user: The authenticated user

Returns:
    Session details including metadata

delete.description:
Delete a session.

Args:
    session_id: The ID of the session to delete
    current_user: The authenticated user

Returns:
    Success message

get.description: Get information about the runtime environment.

Check database tables and return schema info.
Requires admin privileges.
Test embedding generation on a sample text.

schema.default: This is a test sentence for embedding generation
schema.title: Text

get.description:
Get recent log entries.
Requires admin privileges.

Get detailed system status information.
Requires admin privileges.

post.description:
Clear system caches to free up memory.
Requires admin privileges.

Clear a specific model from memory.
Requires admin privileges.

get.description:
Get historical memory usage data.
Requires admin privileges.

post.description:
Optimize system resources with intelligent resource management.

Args:
    background_tasks: FastAPI background tasks
    aggressive: If True, performs more aggressive optimization
    current_user: The authenticated admin user

Returns:
    Status of the optimization request
Process a chat request and return a response.

get.description:
Check the health of the service.

Returns:
    HealthCheck: Health status

Get the current user's session data.
This endpoint requires valid authentication.

Args:
    request: The request object for accessing cookies
    current_user: The authenticated user

Returns:
    Session data including user information

Get the status of the embedding service.

Returns:
    Information about the embedding service configuration and available models

Root endpoint.

Returns:
    Simple welcome message
